description: Muramasa is a blacksmith and the maker of the famous Muramasa swords. He was a former Taishirou. Muramasa crafted Kyou`s, Sasuke`s and Benitora`s legendary weapons. However, he carries a heavy burden of guilt for what the Mibu have done and, in Kyou, he saw the fall of the Mibu. He left the Mibu to teach Kyou, whom he loves as a son.
name: Muramasa
